messages.subject: Moving Day
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings, All. Moving Day is upon us!  Instead of preparing the house and our stuff for it, we ve been nursing a couple of kids through a yucky illness and
messages.messageBody:
Greetings, All.

Moving Day is upon us! Instead of preparing the house and our stuff for it, we've been nursing a couple of kids through a yucky illness and now my husband and I both have this terrible, achy, coughy, fevery, I-just-wanna-go-to-bed-and-die feeling. And there you have my whine for the day.

I don't relish the idea of 10,123 unread messages in my inbox, so I'm going to go off list tonight. I'll see you when we get out from under the boxes!

Sandy

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
